attributes.action: Implement NHS pay review body recommendation of 1% increase in full
attributes.additional_details: The Government should reverse their decision to reject the NHS pay review bodies recommendations and increase pay to all NHS staff by 1% in line with those recommendations. The 0% pay award is unacceptable for hardworking NHS staff when MP's claim they are unable to overturn an 11% award for MPs from a similar independent review

rejection.details: Please see: Give every NHS nurse at least a 1 per cent pay increase
